cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 283 keyboard shortcuts found in Adobe Photoshop

cards.title: Popular shortcuts
cards.back: Cancel any modal dialog window (including the Start Workspace)

cards.title: Popular shortcuts
cards.back: Select the first edit field of the tool bar

cards.title: Popular shortcuts
cards.back: Navigate between fields in the opposite direction

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Magic wand tool > quick selection tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Crop tool > slice tool > slice select tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Eyedropper tool > ruler tool > note tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Spot healing brush tool > healing brush tool > patch tool > red eye tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Brush tool > pencil tool > color replacement tool > mixer brush tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Clone stamp tool > pattern stamp tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: History brush tool > Art history brush tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Eraser tool > background eraser tool > magic eraser tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Dodge tool > burn tool > sponge tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Horizontal type tool > vertical type tool > horizontal type mask tool > vertical type mask tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Path selection tool > direct selection tool

cards.title: Select tools
cards.back: Rectangle tool > rounded rectangle tool > ellipse tool > polygon tool > line tool

cards.title: View images
cards.back: Close a file in Photoshop and open Bridge

cards.title: View images
cards.back: Toggle forward between Standard screen > Full screen with menu bar > Full screen modes

cards.title: View images
cards.back: Toggle backwards between Standard screen > Full screen with menu bar > Full screen modes

cards.title: View images
cards.back: Switch to hand tool (when not in text-edit mode)

cards.title: View images
cards.back: Apply zoom percentage, and keep zoom percentage box active

cards.title: View images
cards.back: Toggle layer mask on/off as rubylith (layer mask must be selected)

cards.title: Use Refine Edge
cards.back: Open the Refine Edge dialog box

cards.title: Use Refine Edge
cards.back: Toggle between original image and selection preview

cards.title: Use Refine Edge
cards.back: Toggle between original selection and refined version

cards.title: Use Refine Edge
cards.back: Toggle radius preview on and off

cards.title: Use Refine Edge
cards.back: Toggle between Refine Radius and Erase Refinement tools

cards.title: Use the Liquify filter
cards.back: Reverse direction for Bloat, Pucker, Push Left, and Mirror tools

cards.title: Use the Liquify filter
cards.back: Cycle through controls on right from top

cards.title: Use the Liquify filter
cards.back: Cycle through controls on right from bottom

cards.title: Use Vanishing Point
cards.back: Create floating selection from the current selection

cards.title: Use Vanishing Point
cards.back: Constrain selection to a 15 degree rotation

cards.title: Use Vanishing Point
cards.back: Delete last node while creating plane
